item.title: Need some help (simple...for you probably)
item.dc:creator: @Elite_Pkz Elite Pkz
item.description:
@Elite_Pkz wrote:

I need something for my client.java so players can pk EVERYWHERE except the dummy training area, and the bank in varrock.
Current Code:

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 01:18:55 PM[/size][hr]Btw, the search engine didn’t work, and I’m not going through 95 pages in the tutorials…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 01:19:34 PM[/size][hr]Nevermind, found it.
